intent.user_query: what are the top 5 customers based on revenue generated?

phases.goal: Retrieve the top 5 customers based on revenue generated from the Sales table in the fitness_db database.

arguments.sql: SELECT c.CustomerID, c.FirstName, c.LastName, SUM(s.TotalAmount) AS TotalRevenue FROM fitness_db.Customers c JOIN fitness_db.Sales s ON c.CustomerID = s.CustomerID GROUP BY c.CustomerID, c.FirstName, c.LastName ORDER BY TotalRevenue DESC LIMIT 5;

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the data gathered.
